title: Plate, 1958
medium:
Glass with metal foil backing
Technique: Slumped
signed: Scratched in signature on back: "Earl McCutchen".
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff
description: Circular plate consisting of three layers of sheet glass "slumped" in mold.  Star-shaped ornament in silvery tones on gay, achieved by metal foil and streaks of glaze arranged between the layer of glass.  Scratched in signature on back: "Earl McCutchen".

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, 1958.
1958. Glass with metal foil backing
Technique: Slumped. Museum purchase through gift of Jacob H. Schiff. 1959-45-1.
